Posts.EditableText: New here, Is it possible to publish games in my own website?

Posts.EditableText: Can I make a suggestion, i mean i don't want to throw away all your effort, the program it's awesome maybe if one could embeed the game from textadventures.co.uk, like youtube does. I'm not sure if this is possible, but it would be cool.
